title: Change password
sub-title: Enter new password and code you received in the email to change your password.

error.min: New password must contain more than 8 characters
error.max: New password must be no longer than 25 characters
error.invalide: New password must contain 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric digit

code.title: Code
code.placeholder: Enter the code you received in the mail

resend-code-btn-title: Didn't receive a code? Click to resend.

successful-password-reset.title: Successfully changed
successful-password-reset.sub-title: Your password has been successfully changed - you will be automatically redirected to the home page.
